 @return epoch

 @return blockhash

params._index: the index in the merkle tree of the element to verify
params._poi: the proof of inclusion as [sibling1, sibling2,..]

returns._0: true if valid data request PoI

params._index: the index in the merkle tree of the element to verify
params._poi: the proof of inclusion as [sibling1, sibling2,..]

getLastBeacon().notice: Returns the beacon from the last inserted block. The last beacon (in bytes) will be used by Witnet Bridge nodes to compute their eligibility.

getLastEpoch().notice: Returns the lastest epoch reported to the block relay.

getLastHash().notice: Returns the latest hash reported to the block relay

isUpgradable(address).notice: Verifies if the block relay can be upgraded

verifyDrPoi(uint256[],uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Verifies the validity of a data request PoI against the DR merkle root

verifyTallyPoi(uint256[],uint256,uint256.notice: Verifies the validity of a tally PoI against the Tally merkle root

userdoc.notice: Interface of a Block Relay to a Witnet network It defines how to interact with the Block Relay in order to support: - Retrieve last beacon information - Verify proof of inclusions (PoIs) of data request and tally transactions
